EDIT_PAGE_SEO_DESC: This page is for collection's owner edit collection profile
EDIT_PAGE_FORM_FIELD_LOGO_SUBTITLE: This image will also be used for navigation. 350 x 350 recommended.
EDIT_PAGE_FORM_FIELD_FEATURED_SUBTITLE: This image will be used for featuring your collection on the homepage, category pages, or other promotional areas. 600 x 400 recommended.
EDIT_PAGE_FORM_FIELD_BANNER_SUBTITLE: This image will appear at the top of your collection page. Avoid including too much text in this banner image, as the dimensions change on different devices. 1400 x 400 recommended.
EDIT_PAGE_FORM_FIELD_CATEGORY_SUBTITLE: Adding a category will help make you item discoverable on FlowMarket.
EDIT_PAGE_FORM_FIELD_COLLABORATORS_SUBTI: Collaborators can modify collection settings, receive payments for items they created, change the collection's creator earnings payout address, and create new items.
